1238.name: ER 80S-B8
1238.Applications: Low alloyed copper-coated solid wire with 9% Cr and 1% Mo to be used for welding creep resistant steel. It finds applications in power plants, chemical or petro-chemical industry and in the ammonia synthesis process. It is also used for heat exchangers, boilers, piping and pressure vessels for temperature service up to 600°C.
